Handoff Component is a design communication tool that helps designers and developers facilitate better design implementation by explicitly creating an environment where designers can describe the decisions taken during the design process to their engineering teammates; using the components template to indicate user flows, design behaviours, component specification, spacing and more.


You should use Handoff Components when sharing your design mockups with developers. Whether youâ€™re adding a new component to an existing page or designing a new product / feature that requires a user journey, use this tool to keep things ordered, documented and easy-to-use for your developers.


Handoff components follows the 8pt grid system.

An example on how to use it to make a proper design handoff is included in this file.
